title: Hero Siege v1.2.3.5 + The Karp of Doom
description:
The kingdom of Tarethiel has been taken over by creatures of hell. Your mission is to cleanse the kingdom and free the citizen from the agonizing wrath of the demon child called Damien. Grab your axe, bow, gun or magic powers and start purging the Gate Keepers and their minions. Hero Siege is a hack'n'slash game with rogue-lite elements. Choose a class and start your survival journey. Find secrets, obtain items, slay hordes of different enemies and bosses.

Changelog:
v1.2.3.5:
General:
- Shop now works more consistently
- Added a new Relic into the game (DLC only).
- Pause system re-made, no more pause crashes.
Classes:
- Pyromancer Blazing Trail fixed.
Minion:
- Minion in multiplayer fixed
Co-op:
- Player 2 Charms fixed
v1.2.3.4:
General:
- Spells causing lag bugs on bushes fixed.
- Urns and Boxes can now be destroyed with any spells etc.
- Buffed enemy hp and damage scaling towards endgame a bit.
- Samurai ACT 3 achievement for HC fixed.
- Burning enchant damage nerfed.
- Forgotten Depths causing infinite loop and crashing game fixed
- Fixed nightmare not unlocking after beating normal
Classes:
- Marksman AGILITY no longer gives movement speed boost.
- Pyro Armageddon fixed and nerfed.
- Pirate cannonball buffed to max 30% chance from 17%
- Marksman homing missile limited to max 30% chance and damage fixed.
- Samurai Vorpal Enchant fixed.
Co-op:
- Player 2 now also gets orbits from picking up relics instantly.
- Orbits crashing game not fiding player fixed.
- Pyro casting spell as player crash game fixed.
Multiplayer:
- Crash on exit fixed
- Better Login / Register navigation on gamepad
Minion:
- Graphical fixes for Minion
- Minion no longer seeks to an enemy outside the view
- Minion levels are now slot based. 

Includes The Karp of Doom (Digital Collector's Edition) content:  <a href="
